instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6. Place the potatoes in the centre of 2 large squares of baking parchment. Top each with the chicken. Scatter over the vegetables and add the ginger and chilli sauce.

Fold over 2 sides of the paper and fold the other sides under the parcel to enclose. Place on a baking tray and bake for 35 minutes until cooked throughout with no pink meat. Serve in the baking parchment.
